title: Bullish Two Hundred Day Moving Average Cross - ROBO - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Thursday, shares of the ROBO ETF (Symbol: ROBO) crossed above their 200 day moving average of $37.43, changing hands as high as $37.62 per share. ROBO shares are currently trading up about 2.7% on the day. The chart below shows the one year performance of ROBO shares, versus its 200 day moving average:
